name: The stupid knight
description:
Hello, I'm a sixteen year old young developer and here is my second game. 
It's the first time I've participated in a game jam, I'm looking forward to your comments. Thank you.
In this game You play a knight desperately wanting to save a princess who doesn't give a damn about you. Climb the floors of the castle avoiding the lava and the enemies to reach your goal.
All graphics and animations were made by my little brother, you can see his youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@cepafifou
